name: Grr I Don't Like You Rage Game
name_original: Grr I Don't Like You Rage Game
description:
Is this the hardest game ever?

It's really hard.

You can 3 jump.

Please run it in fullscreen so that the minimap will be visible,

It's still kind of a prototype and it may have bugs.

Credit to slope by RobKaySF on Twitter for graphical inspiration!
